abstract: Manhattan jury begins deliberation in case of James Brady, Marko Markovich and Andrew Rossig, three men who were arrested after parachuting from 1 World Trade Center in 2013; most serious charge, felony burglary, carries potential sentence of seven years in prison.
lead_paragraph: In closing arguments in Manhattan, prosecutors and defense lawyers both used the wording of the felony burglary law to try to prove their cases.

headline.main: Case of World Trade Center Parachutists Goes to Jury
headline.print_headline: Jurors Begin Deliberating Case of 3 Trade Center Parachutists

snippet: In closing arguments in Manhattan, prosecutors and defense lawyers both used the wording of the felony burglary law to try to prove their cases.
